verses.name: 2 Kings 5:19
verses.text: And he said unto him, Go in peace. So he departed from him a little way.

verses.name: 2 Kings 5:20
verses.text: But Gehazi, the servant of Elisha the man of God, said, Behold, my master hath spared Naaman this Syrian, in not receiving at his hands that which he brought: but, as the Lord liveth, I will run after him, and take somewhat of him.

verses.name: 2 Kings 5:21
verses.text: So Gehazi followed after Naaman. And when Naaman saw him running after him, he lighted down from the chariot to meet him, and said, Is all well?
